title: Interpretation of a dream about eating sweets in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see eating sweets in a dream, to see eating delicious sweets, means eating sour sweets, buying sweets and eating them in a dream, eating sweets in a bad way, interpretation of sweets being born, eating pulp in a dream, and many more. People dream in a dream that they are eating sweets and do not know what good and evil it refers to, so today we will explain to you the interpretation of the dream of eating sweets in detail. Interpretation of the dream of eating sweets by Ibn Sirin: The interpretation of the dream that we are eating sweets in a dream shows kindness, blessing, and grace in general. To dream of eating sweets Eastern and Western sweets mean good news, joy and good news. Dreaming that I am eating a lot of sweets in a dream indicates many blessings and wonderful living for me. The interpretation of seeing sweets and their sweet and delicious taste in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is a good person and distinguishes the truth from lies. Eating Greedy sweets in a dream means getting a lot of halal money, heartache and stress. If we dream that we see ourselves buying sweets and eating them in a dream, this is a sign of psychological comfort, calm and stability. Interpretation of a dream about eating sweets according to Al-Nabulsi: Interpretation of a dream about eating sweets in a dream, as interpreted by Al-Nabulsi It is a sign of comfort after distress, recovery after illness, and the return of the absent. To see yourself eating sweets filled with honey means marrying a person, but if eating sweets is hard in the dream, this indicates illness and sadness. Dreaming of eating sweet dates in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is... Someone who is close to God and also has a good ending. Interpretation of a dream about eating sweets for a single woman: Interpretation of making sweets in a dream for a single woman indicates a short relationship and marriage. Dreaming about eating sweets in a single girl’s dream is evidence of her official relationship with someone she loves. Seeing that she was born eating sweets In a dream, it is evidence that she will marry a good man and that her marriage will be happy. Seeing sweets being eaten in a dream for an unmarried woman is a sign of happy news and happiness in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about eating sweets for a married woman: The dream of seeing Pasabsha eating for a married woman is an indication of She lives with her husband in happiness and peace. The interpretation of a dream that the husband offers sweets and eats them in a married woman’s dream indicates the presence of love and intimacy in her. Seeing a married woman buying sweets and eating them in a dream means that she will become pregnant soon. The interpretation of eating sweets in a dream for a married woman is evidence of Comprehensive savings and abundant goodness for her and her family. Interpretation of a dream about making sweets for a married woman indicates that she is a good woman and bears responsibility for her husband and family. Interpretation of a dream about eating sweets for a pregnant woman: Interpretation of eating sweets in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates an easy and easy birth without stress or pain. A dream about eating indicates Delicious sweets in a pregnant woman’s dream indicate that she will give birth to a girl. Interpretation of a dream about eating sweets without food indicates that the baby is male. Interpretation of a dream about eating sweets for a man:

title: Interpretation of seeing fire in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Seeing a fire breaking out in her house indicates the good things that she does, and the abundant goodness that she will see in her life and that she will live a happy life. Interpretation of seeing a fire in a dream for one girl: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is lighting a fire in her room and cannot put it out. It shows that there are things that make her sad. She has this unique time in her life and is trying to get rid of it by doing reckless things. The unmarried girl seeing that the fire was consuming her house in a dream, taking away the most important things from her. It indicates that there are major sins that this single girl has committed in her life and she must stay away from this matter. Likewise The unmarried girl saw that the fire was in front of her, and its light shone in the dream, and she was happy to see it. It explains that she will get married soon if she was engaged before, or that she will be engaged in the near future. Either the unmarried girl who enters the fire in a dream and no harm has touched her in the dream and she She laughs and is happy. The meaning mentions the bad things that happen with this unique period of her life, and makes her very sad, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. See also: Interpretation of a dream about fire in a dream by Ibn Sirin and its meaningInterpretation of seeing fire in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman dreams that she is looking at fire and she She fills her house in a dream, and this is a very bad thing in the dream. It indicates that there are major problems that this married woman and her husband are suffering from at this time and the matter is not over. This is the dreaming married woman who looks at the fire while she is in her house and is unable to get rid of it in the dream. A sign If there are big problems, you will see them in their lives and enter into them and it will be difficult to get rid of them. What if a married woman enters the fire to protect her house, and tries to extinguish it in a dream. It indicates that she will do many things in her life so that problems do not reach her married life. Either a married woman Who sees that fire was on her clothes in a dream, and tries to put it out with fear in the dream. It explains that she will live in very difficult matters, full of immorality and sins in her life, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of seeing fire in a dream for a divorced womanIf a divorced woman looks at fire in a dream while she is eating Her house in the dream, and she feels very sad. It indicates that she will see her getting rid of the memories that belong to her with her ex-husband now, and God knows best. Either a divorced woman sees in a dream that she had a lot of fire in her house and she was trying to protect her family in the dream. This is an indication that she will enter during This period includes many disagreements and problems with her family, and God is Most High. A divorced woman who sees in a dream that there is a lot of fire in her clothes and in her work office in a dream. It appears that there are new disputes and quarrels that will arise in her workplace and she will not be able to get rid of them easily. From The ultimate dream woman is likely to be able to put out the fire in a dream from her home, and recover her belongings in the dream. It is interpreted that he will be able to get rid of sorrows during this time, God willing, and he will be very happy about that.

title: Interpretation of a dream about miscarriage for a single woman

preview.html: If she does not see blood in the dream, this indicates that she will be happy in her life, and plans for a bright future, and God knows best, and if she sees the fetus in the dream, this indicates the future life. Interpretation of seeing a miscarriage in a dream for an unmarried girl: If the unmarried woman sees that she is pregnant by her lover in a dream and aborts the fetus in the dream. It indicates that during this period she will stumble a lot in her future life, and God knows best. And the unmarried woman who saw that she aborted the fetus without feeling tired or tired. Bleeding in a dream. It indicates that she will live her life happily, and plan for a long future, God willing. An unmarried girl who sees that she miscarries a fetus in a dream from her desire to do so. It indicates that she will suffer a lot in her life during this time and that she will be sad, and God knows best. Seeing a single girl in The dream is that she aborts the fetus in the dream and she does not want it. It indicates that she will do wrong things in her life that she will regret in the future. See also: Experiences of pregnant women with dreams. Interpretation of seeing a miscarriage in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that she aborted the fetus in the dream and she is sad. It appears that she will lose Something in her life and she is very sad to lose it at this time. And a married woman who sees in a dream that she is dropping her child in a dream out of her desire. This indicates that she will make a quick decision in her life and regret it later. And if a married woman aborts the fetus in a dream, and she miscarries in the dream A lot of blood. It indicates that she will stumble a lot in her next life and will face great problems and troubles. The same is true for a married woman who dreams of a miscarriage and does not want to give birth to the fetus. It indicates that she will lose large sums of money in her life and will be sad about it. Interpretation of seeing a miscarriage in a dream for a divorced womanIf a divorced woman dreams of her pregnancy And she aborted the fetus. It indicates that she is currently doing something wrong in her life and that this issue makes her very sad. If a divorced woman sees in a dream aborting the fetus while bleeding. This indicates that she will stumble a lot in her life now, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. As for seeing a divorced woman in a dream, She miscarries her fetus in a dream while she is sad. She explains that she will lose something important in her life and she is trying to hold on to it desperately. What if a divorced woman dreams that her ex-husband will miscarry her fetus? This indicates that she will return to him again, marry him, and live a happy life. Read also: Signs in a dream that indicate On pregnancy with a boy. Interpretation of seeing a miscarriage in a dream for a man and its meaning. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is looking at his wife in a dream, she is also aborting the fetus. The interpretation explains that he will face a major crisis in his life, and he will not end it easily. While he saw that the man was looking at an unknown woman who had miscarried in front of him and was It bleeds from her. It indicates that he will stumble a lot morally and financially in his life and this is what makes him very sad. If a man sees a woman near him in a dream, she will have a miscarriage in the dream and she will be very tired. This indicates that this dreamer will be very sad in his next life, and God knows best. Likewise A man who protects his wife

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a man falling from the sky in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a man falling from the sky in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a man falling from the sky in a dream. Interpretation of dreams: Seeing a man falling from the sky in a dream can be a sign of a lesson and admonition. It may also indicate that the dreamer is warned of evil, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees himself falling From the sky in a dream, this may be evidence that he has forgotten the afterlife, and God knows the unseen. It can indicate dealing with the world, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of the dream when you see someone hanging in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing someone hanging in a dream, it could be an indication that the person He makes worldly matters difficult for himself and those around him, and God knows the unseen. When you see a person hanging himself in a dream, this may indicate his cruelty towards himself, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a married woman sees a person hanged, this may lead to his cruelty to herself, and God knows the unseen, while the gallows may indicate Freedom from the responsibilities of life, and God knows the unseen. However, seeing a sister having sex with someone can lead to negative consequences, and God knows the unseen. Some negatives may also appear in reality, and God knows best. When you see an ugly sister, it may indicate bad deeds, and God knows the unseen. When a single girl sees a man under the bed in a dream, this may indicate people who want to interfere in her affairs, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If she sees a married woman A man under the bed in a dream, this may indicate that people are trying to ruin her life, and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of a husband hitting his wife in a dream is a vision of hitting the wife with a hand or palm in the face

preview.html: If the husband hits his pregnant woman or someone else, he stops in the face, with the hand, with a stick, or with a whip and an executioner. Interpretation of hitting a wife in a dream: To see a husband beating his wife in a dream, or for a woman to dream that her husband is hitting her in the dream with his hand, means that something from the killer, i.e. the husband, is coming. His wife is in his hand or he can bring her. Pointing out that the hand is power in the dream, and it is either a happy gift or closeness to her with love and tenderness, or the money he gives her to store or buy something she wants. Other interpreters say that a dream of a husband beating his wife if there are strangers in the place or in the house at the same time The time he hits her, he will be accused of scandal or he will actually commit a sin that will be punished by removal, expulsion from her husband, or separation; Because strangers here are evidence of breaking the veil or revealing a secret, and if the beating is accompanied by cursing, cursing, and insulting, then it indicates a misunderstanding or cunning of the woman. The man burdens him with her and suspects her, or he goes looking for others or stays away from her. Commentators also said that if a man sees a husband Pregnant or a pregnant woman herself sees that her husband hits her with his hand in a dream, then he will give her a child who will please her and become close to her. She and his child, and the house will be penetrated by love and tenderness, and in the relationship between the spouses there are major problems, and if there are strangers present for the man to hit his pregnant wife in the dream, then she will either lose the fetus in her stomach. Or she loses her husband, or the child is the reason for the increase in crises and problems between the two parties. If he hits his wife with his foot or shoe. As for the husband using his foot to hit his wife in a dream or hitting his shoe, this indicates that days will come when the wife will be exposed to humiliation. Interpretation of the husband hitting his wife on Her face: All commentators say that the husband beats his wife, whether she is pregnant or someone else, or has not yet given birth, or she is the mother of his children, and the dream is about the man or woman in the dream. Hitting on the face shows something bad will happen at home and cause problems between these spouses. The issue will be a man, and if this woman sees it, the cause of the dispute will be a woman like her from the home world or relatives. The husband hits his wife with an instrument. The instrument in hitting is usually a bad mother between the spouses, and represents an indication of Ranking of each instrument or similar instruments in multiplication. What her husband did to herself will be revealed to her and her husband will recognize her. A sharp tool indicates a woman’s honor or fame if her husband is beaten. As for the husband who beats her with wood, wood, plastic, whips, executioners, or something similar, it breaks the bones of the body without harming her or harming her. Without harming her, this indicates his evil and the wife’s deception towards him or her. His family. Interpretation of dreams about beating one’s husband - YouTube

title: Interpretation of the dream of receiving a salary in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing receiving a salary or receiving a pension in a dream, or dreaming that I received a salary, indicates the disappearance of problems, financial stability, and other interpretations that we will mention to you for single women, married women, pregnant women, and divorced women, men, and Ibn Sirin, the great dream interpreter in the Arab world: Interpretation of receiving a salary in a dream, who sees Himself receiving a salary in a dream, this interprets that the dreamer will enter a job and receive a regular and continuous income and that the dreamer will make managed investments for the future with the money he earns, and that he will buy a house. At an early age. If you dream of receiving a salary, this means that your financial problems will disappear. Seeing receiving a salary in a dream indicates that this person will find solutions that will make him improve his financial situation and will know the value of money in his hands because it will serve as capital for future business. Seeing receiving a salary in a dream indicates that the dreamer will help his family and save money in difficult days. The dream also indicates an increase in material resources and also expresses how happy a person is who has an unexpected amount of money, which will make him fly in the air with great joy. Getting A salary in a dream indicates that the person who saw the dream will save a certain amount of money to invest in a business in his career, but then he will earn several times more than the money he invested. At the same time, receiving a salary in a dream indicates that every penny Of the money earned by the sweat of the eyebrow, it will be abundant and contain all the blessings because it comes from a legitimate source. Seeing receiving a salary in a dream indicates that the dreamer has legitimate money that he earns from the work he has accomplished, and at the same time it is an indication of the money that he always earns in professional life or social as a result. Concluding some successful business deals. Whoever sees that he is receiving a salary in a dream means that he will spend a large part of the salary on work to get rid of the problems that he will face in practical life during this period. If you dream that you are receiving a pension in a dream, this portends that friends will help you in Your struggle, and if you fail to get a pension, you will lose due to your inability to complete your work. If you see that you are receiving your salary, and you see that the amount is greater than it should be, it means that a good period will come for you and everything you think about will come true. It may mean signing a pay slip In a dream, you will solve all the challenges you will face. Receiving a salary from a new source may mean that others will be ungrateful, or it may mean that you have been violated in some way in reality. This may be due to the theft of an idea or something you like. Receiving a salary in a dream represents that you are working hard to meet your needs in life. Receiving a salary in a dream is likely to be disturbed by expectations in your financial situation. On the other hand, unexpected success will be achieved for those who are just starting their business. Getting On a low salary in a dream and less than usual is an unfavorable sign and indicates your unstable situation at work.E

title: What is the interpretation of prayer in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream for a single girl: Seeing an unmarried woman praying in a dream for rain, and crying loudly. She announces the great delay of her marriage until the next period of her life, and God is Great and Knows. She also explains that she is currently unable to find the right person to marry in her life. And prayer Friday in a dream for an unmarried girl, and she prays it with a group of women in the dream. It indicates that she will prepare for marriage in the near future, and will live happily ever after. It also indicates the good things that many members of her family will experience in that coming period. The dream indicates that soon the elimination On the problems and difficulties in the life of an unmarried girl. And seeing her praying in her home does not have a tinge of kindness, nourishment, and goals for her, God willing. An unmarried woman who prays and does not complete her prayer is an indication of many problems and obstacles that she lives with. See also: Interpretation of a dream about praying to the Prophet For single people, married people, and men. Interpretation of watching prayer in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman praying in front of a man in the mosque, and she was focusing on her prayer a lot. It indicates that she is entering into a new matter in her life, and she is wrong about it and she must return from it. The dream indicates that there are difficult matters that the married woman is experiencing. And she enters into it willingly. A married woman is praying in a dream inside her house and she did not complete her prayer in the dream. It appears that there are obstacles in her life that she cannot get rid of and that she is sad to go through. Seeing prayer in the mosque with a group of women indicates an abundance of goodness and contentment for her. If he forces girls to pray in a dream, this indicates the good deeds he does. Seeing her praying with her husband at home is a sign of their closeness to God, God willing. A married woman who prays in her dream shows the good that will come to her without trouble and unhappiness. Interpretation of the vision of praying In a dream for a divorced woman, seeing a divorced woman praying in a dream, and feeling very happy in the dream. She says that she is relieved from some of the severe pains and tensions that she is experiencing in her life. It is also interpreted that he will soon receive a lot of goodness and full of good things. She is a divorced woman dreaming and crying in front of the men in their mosque. It indicates However, she is wrong in her matter, and does not think about her sorrows wisely, and God knows best. She also explains that she is having a lot of fun in life and does not focus on her goal or dream. Praying in a dream for a divorced woman is what saves her from troubles, problems, and losses in her life. If she prays dawn in a dream, this indicates On her extreme closeness to God Almighty at this time. Praying for rain in a dream is a sign of something fraught with sadness that she has recently entered into. Read also: Interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream and its importance according to NablusInterpretation of seeing prayer in a dream for a man and its meaningSeeing the dreamer praying a lot in a dream means He is comfortable and happy. This indicates that goodness and contentment overwhelm him in many of the things that he does, God willing. It also indicates his great closeness to God Almighty in this period of his life, and God is the Most Merciful.

title: Drinking water in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation for singles, married, divorced, males, young people and pregnant women, everyone, and you have more interpretations from Mufsir, the largest dream interpretation site in the world, so stay with us to learn more. Interpretation of seeing drinking water in a dream for a single girl Seeing a single girl drinking water in her dream indicates the emotional stability that the girl enjoys in her life. Also, seeing her drinking from it to the point of satiety indicates how much she needs a husband to help her in the future. Also, drinking fresh water indicates that you enjoy health, prosperity and longevity. At other times, drinking water to the teeth represents the completion of her marriage contract and her happy life with her future husband. Seeing her in need of water indicates that the person she loves does not accept her. In addition to drinking water in her dream, it expresses her urgent desire to need motherhood and start a family. When she sees that he is drinking clean water, this is good news for recovery from some diseases. This vision also shows that he did not perform the acts of obedience to the fullest. The person who offers her water represents her calm and stable life. If she sees that she is walking on water, this indicates the successes that This girl will achieve it. It may also indicate her marriage to a person of good reputation. When she sees him drinking from a place full of water, this indicates that all the difficulties he is going through have been overcome. The vision may be a harbinger of achieving her ambitions at work. See also: Interpretation of seeing water in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq Interpretation of seeing drinking water in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees in a dream that she is drinking water, this indicates the good and abundant livelihood that she gets. Drinking salty water indicates the difficulties that this woman faces and that disrupt her life, and God knows best. When she sees him drinking hot water, this also indicates that he is in trouble. The husband offering her water in a dream expresses his love for her and his care for her. Also, seeing water everywhere indicates an abundance of food and comfort in life. Drinking water from a cup is considered news of her imminent pregnancy. Her feeling of thirst and need for water shows that she has not performed her worship to the fullest. If she sees that she is drinking from Zamzam water, this indicates her financial and emotional stability with her husband. Drinking running water in a married woman's dream represents her stable family life full of tranquility And happiness. When you see that she is drinking cloudy water, this indicates many difficulties in her life. While clear water reflects prosperity and happiness. Interpretation of seeing drinking water in a dream for a divorced woman If a divorced woman sees that she is drinking water from a cup in a dream, this indicates an abundance of sustenance. This vision is a sign that he has overcome all the crises he is going through. Drinking cloudy water in a divorced woman’s dream represents challenges in her life. If you see her drinking clean water, this indicates God’s compensation for what she went through in her previous married life. When you see her drinking from Zamzam water, this is good news that God will take care of her, and the end of a financial crisis that passes. If she sees that she needs

title: Interpretation of seeing wearing glasses or glasses in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of wearing glasses or wearing glasses in a dream or a dream via the vision website roy2a.com. Glasses are what is worn on the eye and are either medical to help the wearer see correctly or sunglasses to protect the eye from exposure to sunlight. As for seeing glasses in a dream, it has Many indicators and interpreters differed in the interpretation of seeing glasses in a dream according to the type of glasses, whether they are medical or sunglasses, and according to the state and condition of the dreamer. And the circumstances, whether male or female, single, married, or pregnant.. Today, through one of the vision websites, we will discuss the interpretation of the vision in detail based on the opinion of major commentators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and the Ambassadors. Al-Nabulsi and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing Ibn Sirin wearing glasses: Seeing glasses in a dream indicates that there is something that the viewer ignores and needs to notice and take care of. Seeing a person wearing glasses who has dust shows that he is not aware of some of the things going on around him. Seeing a person wearing glasses Glasses with dust on them indicate that the dreamer does not understand certain things, and he must remove negative thoughts that affect the understanding of things. See also: Interpretation of seeing a beautiful woman in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a man wearing glasses: Seeing a man wearing glasses in a dream It indicates his severity and fatigue and finally he got a lot Of money and livelihood as a result. Seeing a man with gold or silver glasses in a dream indicates the unique talent that the viewer has. Seeing a man asking someone to wear glasses indicates that he views this person as a role model and admires his style, behavior, and good outlook on things. When He sees a man wearing glasses, seeing different things and colors. It shows that he is an obsessive and suspicious person who does not act correctly and balanced. Seeing lost glasses and searching for them in a dream indicates an important matter for the monarch who will miss his appointment. What is the interpretation of seeing a single woman wearing glasses: Seeing a woman alone wearing sunglasses in a dream. The dream indicates her shyness and isolation, but at the same time she is ambitious and aspires to achieve her goals. Seeing a single woman wearing sunglasses in a dream shows that she has sensitive feelings and strong romantic feelings. Seeing single women wearing glasses in a dream indicates that there is someone near her and she should think carefully about his person. And study her feelings towards him. Seeing unmarried women wearing glasses in a dream indicates an issue related to himself in which he needs the opinion of a reliable and wise person close to him. See also: Interpretation of seeing parsley in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a married woman wearing glasses: Seeing a married woman wearing glasses in a dream? It shows what you have for the right vision and the ability to solve problems by making the right decisions. A married woman seeing that her eyesight is very weak in a dream indicates that she only thinks about herself when making decisions without taking into account the interest or desire of those around her. Seeing a married woman wearing glasses Umbrella in a dream refers to
